content:
Prints documentation of the inputted package and/or field. Usage Examples: 
	1) `/api haxe.Json` 
	2)`/api haxe.Json parse`
	3) `/api flixel.FlxBasic active`
Over time, some frameworks and channels have been closed down. You can have a browse through the chat history
Used in conjunction with the `/run` command. Just shows the available libraries you can use with said command
Type a channel to receive notifications from key people within those communities when big things change
Just a quick an easy way to create a basic poll for up to 3 days

A command to save content, save things that are useful to yourself or others. The first parameter is the identifier you select quotes by, however you may also you the generated id.
 The second is what you want to do with a quote. 

- Quote names are unique users, can contain: `_-: and spaces`.
- Names are case insensitive
It is what it is, want to make a note and get pinged/dmed about it after some time? Use this command!
An introduction tailored to the channel framework, leave the parameter empty or specify the framework `/rtfm heaps`
Run haxe code in discord! See pin in <#663246792426782730> for a description on how to use this
The command to gain access to posting into the <#162664383082790912> channel!
This just runs a haxe trace log, useful for quick tests or math. `/trace 5 + 5` or `/trace 'hey'`
Hey, did you read the rules? We can't help with project/game specific issues. Please check out the appropriate discord server - https://discord.gg/RZAcgZJnG8
Hey, did you read the rules? We can't help with project/game specific issues. Please check out the appropriate discord server - https://discord.gg/2ka77eMXDv

This is a question and answer process that helps users get aid, whilst also providing extra help to the helpers. 
Something that happens a lot is users will request for help without providing enough information for someone to help answer their question - this tool is here to work as a middle man to index and present that information in a clear way to get help faster.

If you would like to cancel your request or skip a question type `cancel` or `skip`. 

If you are having issues or have found a bug please post all the information you can to the <#921583403520892939> channel.

There are ways to request help that will get you the help you need faster. Check out the following guide: 
 <https://github.com/runkanrenchu/syntax-guide/blob/master/HOW%20TO%20ASK.md>
